IntegrationProviderAttr.name: IntegrationProviderAttr
IntegrationProviderAttr.description: Represents information about the attributes that are used in the definition for an integration provider.

DataType.description: Specifies the data type of the attribute.

DateTimeValue.description: The date time value of the attribute.

DateValue.description: The date value of the attribute.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the integration provider attribute.

DoubleValue.description: The double value of the attribute.

IntegerValue.description: The integer value of the attribute.

IntegrationProviderDefId.description: The integration provider definition that's associated with the attribute.

IsRequired.description: Indicates if the attribute is required (true) or not (false).

IsTrueOrFalseValue.description: The value in the boolean field of the attribute.

MasterLabel.description: The master label of the attribute.

PercentageValue.description: The percentage value of the attribute.

StringValue.description: The string value of the attribute.
